pinyin: zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 shi1 zheng4

sentences.english: Genetic counseling should be considered for individuals with a family history of albinism or hypopigmentation.
sentences.chinese: 遗传咨询应考虑个人与家族病史白化或色素缺失。

sentences.english: An absence of the exposure of knowledge-based assets will cause a seriously underrated evaluation of enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 对知识资产披露的缺失使企业价值被严重低估。

sentences.english: How can parents in father-absent homes compensate, if at all?
sentences.chinese: 在父爱缺失的家庭，父母该如何补偿孩子？

sentences.english: Synopsis: An amnesiac spy awakens in a world overrun by zombies.
sentences.chinese: 一个记忆缺失的特工在一个僵尸遍野的世界苏醒。

sentences.english: This crisis of meaningless is a relatively new thing.
sentences.chinese: 相对而言，这场意义缺失危机是新事物。

sentences.english: Such attributions falsely account for the lack of connection.
sentences.chinese: 而这种归因错误地导致了和他人之间互动的缺失。

sentences.english: Together they form the missing framework steps for adaptive business system design.
sentences.chinese: 它们一起形成了自适应系统设计所缺失的框架步骤。

sentences.english: The root cause of the loss of CPAs sincerity lies in the deficiency of system proper.
sentences.chinese: 注册会计师诚信缺失的根源在于制度缺陷。

sentences.english: The anatomic level of the lesion generally correlates with the motor and sensory deficit.
sentences.chinese: 损伤的解剖等级与运动神经和感觉神经的缺失正相关。

sentences.english: It is short of prosecutive right of civil servant in civil servant system.
sentences.chinese: 公务员的检举权在公务员制度中是有所缺失的。

sentences.english: An implant and an all-ceramic crown restored the site of a congenitally missing lateral incisor.
sentences.chinese: 使用植体及全瓷冠修复先天性缺失的侧切牙。

sentences.english: Therefore, to evaluate interregional government cooperation it is necessary to have public management point of view.
sentences.chinese: 因此，考量区域政府间合作就不能缺失公共管理视角。

sentences.english: Lack of sleep promotes obesity by messing with these hunger hormones.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠缺失促进肥胖，因其干扰了这些饥饿激素。

sentences.english: Lumbosacral lipoma can be responsible for progressive neurological and urological defects.
sentences.chinese: 腰骶部脂肪瘤导致了神经功能和小便功能的缺失。

sentences.english: Such cells have raised hopes of replacing lost or diseased tissue.
sentences.chinese: 这样的细胞增加了更换缺失组织或者患病组织的希望。

sentences.english: Loss of fidelity in the data being displayed is another key risk.
sentences.chinese: 显示的数据中保真度的缺失是另一个主要风险。

definition: to complement/to make up for a deficiency
to be deficient in sth/to be short of sth (supplies, money etc)
to fill a gap/to fill in a blank (on a form)/to overcome a deficiency
to trace something to its source (idiom)
short stave of the barrel (which allows the contents to escape)/(fig.) shortcoming/weak point
